I've had an idea floated past me that I would like to get feedback on.

I s=
uspect that many people come to [rest-discuss] with the hope of on-
boardin=
g their knowledge of REST but finding many of our discussions 
very obtuse =
and 'theoretical'. Soon enough, they become disenchanted 
and wander off mu=
ttering about 'architects with their heads in the 
clouds' ... and, yes, th=
e pun was intentional ;-)

The idea I would like to discuss is a [rest-for-=
beginners] group to be 
created, with a focus on practical answers to get p=
eople going with 
REST. Any discussions that head off into minutiae can be =
pushed over 
into this group for more in-depth discussion.

Thoughts?

Rega=
rds,
